name: Slime-AI
description:
Slimes collect coins for you, Buy slimes and upgrade stuff.

V0.3

Changelog:

0.1, First version of the game. Nothing much in it.

0.3, Second version of the game. More achievements, and battles.

0.4, Third version of the game.  Made it that you can disable the backup text, Also added a "little" secret into the game. Get 350 slimes to find out what it is!

0.41, Just fixed the slime gone of screen glitch.

Random Questions About The Game Because Why Not:

1. Q. How do the slimes not die from not getting fed? A. They eat the bacteria on the coins and can survive without food for a week before dying.

ok that's it.
